businesses.description: FKC-Lake Shore offers design-build-install services for innovative hoisting, elevator, and vertical conveyance systems used to transport personnel and material.  Our Field Services Division provides 24/7 emergency repair of electrical and mechanical systems.  Products & Services:  Vertical Belts, Skips, Hoists, Sheaves, Elevators, Cages, Headframes, Brakeman Cars, Controls, Field Services, and Wire Rope NDT.
